GR13goramaru:1: * yac candraprabhavaṃ varāmbaragataṃ yal liṅgasaṃjñaṃ jalaṃ sa prāṇas tadadhaḥ sthiraṃ ca kamalaṃ dhatte mukhordhvaṃ hṛdi || 1.1
GR13goramaru:2: * baddhvā kumbhakam ātmagāḍharacitaṃ tad brahmanāḍīgataṃ hy ānetuṃ vadane ṣaḍadhvagakalā saivaṃvidhā sāraṇā || 1.2]
GR13goramaru:5: * saṃprāptaṃ hanurandhramūlavidhinā yac candratoyaṃ mukhe tat sarvaṃ ravikālarūpasadane rakṣet parā sāraṇā || 2.2]
GR13goramaru:7: * nṛtyan nityordhvajihvo yadi pibati pumān vaktradhārāmṛtaughaṃ susvādaṃ śītalāṅgaṃ duritabhayaharaṃ kṣutpipāsāvināśi || 3.1
GR13goramaru:8: * piṇḍasthairyaṃ yad asmād bhavati bata mahāmṛtyurogā dravante daurbhāgyaṃ yāti nāśaṃ harati viṣajarāṃ yāti kāle bhramitvā || 3.2]
GR13goramaru:10: * jihvāgraṃ tv atha rājadantavivaraṃ nītvā tato ghaṇṭikāṃ saṃsthāpya pratijihvaparva śaśino mārge kalāṃ ca kṣipet || 4.1
GR13goramaru:11: * evaṃsāraṇike patanti ca sudhādhārāḥ punaḥ ṣaṇmukhagāndhārāpy atha tatkalāpamathanaṃ nāḍīmukhojjṛmbhaṇam sāraṇānantaraṃ pratisāraṇā kathyate // 5
GR13goramaru:15: * nāsāpaścimamārgavāhapavanāt prāṇe 'tidīrghīkṛte candrāmbu pratisāraṇāṃ sukṛtinaḥ prāgghaṇṭikāyāḥ pathaḥ || 6.1
GR13goramaru:16: * siñcan kālaviśālavahnivaśagaṃ bhūtvā sa nāḍīśataṃ tat kāryaṃ kurute punar navatanuṃ jīrṇadrumaskandhavat pratisāraṇānantaraṃ śaṅkhasāraṇā kathyate // 7
GR13goramaru:17: * protkṣiptaṃ vṛṣaṇasya golakayugaṃ madhye dhvajaṃ proddhvajaṃ nityordhve bata śaṅkhasāraṇavidhau vaktraṃ vidheyaṃ nijam || 7.1
GR13goramaru:18: * sarvasthānaśarīrabandhanavaśāt skandhoddhṛtānāṃ yathā nāḍīnāṃ mukhataḥ sudhānidhijalaṃ siñcann adho gacchati || 7.2]
GR13goramaru:23: * paścād āsanaśuddhavātanikarān ādāya kaṇṭhavraṇāt saṃsthāpyā ravimaṇḍale
GR13goramaru:25: * devī madhyapathoditā prakurute kampaṃ tato mūrchanāṃ dūrakarṣaṇadarśanaṃ śrutigaṇāṃś cānyā mahāsāraṇā || 9.2]
GR13goramaru:29: * tatraivāṅgulibhir nipīḍya kramaśaḥ śāntiṃ mano mārutaṃ candro yāti raviṃ
GR13goramaru:33: * śrīmanmadhyapathāntato vidadhatī kampādi kopānvitā tasyaivāśrayayāyino 'pi śaśino dattā sudhā saṃmatā || 10.4
GR13goramaru:34: * ādau śoṣaṇiko 'tra sāraṇam ataḥ kāryaṃ mahāsāraṇaṃ kartavyaṃ pratisāraṇaṃ ca guruṇā nirdiṣṭamārgaṃ kramāt || 10.5
GR13goramaru:35: * paścād eva ca śaṅkhasāraṇavidhau kāryaṃ mahāsāraṇaṃ sammūrchā vitatākṛtiḥ pratidinaṃ velātrayaṃ dīyatām || 10.6
GR13goramaru:36: * ākuñcyāgajakāmarūpam acalaṃ bandhatvajātaṃ tanau nātyūrdhve caturaṅgulāgravidite sthāne hṛdā prāṇite || 10.7
GR13goramaru:37: * dantair bandhurite ca vātayugale praśleṣaṇāśleṣaṇāt nābhigranthivimokṣapātasahaje mārge manaḥsiddhayaḥ || 10.8
GR13goramaru:38: * dūrākāravisarpite ca pavane nābheś ca mārgasthite bandheṣu triṣu satsu
GR13goramaru:40: * kṣipraṃ ca dhriyate dvipīṭhamaruto 'py ūrdhvakramākarṣaṇe saṃyukto gaticittaśoṣaṇam ataḥ prāpye 'nile tiṣṭhati || 10.10
GR13goramaru:41: * mūle mūlordhvacakre vṛṣaṇakulatale vahnimātaṅgakūle kampakṣobhabhramāḍhye dhvanitaparicayaṃ gharmapātordhvaroma || 10.11
GR13goramaru:42: * bhūmityāgaṃ kavitvaṃ parapuraviśanaṃ vaśyam ākarṣaṇaṃ ca hy evaṃ vā
GR13goramaru:44: * dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca tat || 10.13
GR13goramaru:45: * hṛdaye parame dhāmni madhye tu ravicandramāḥ || 10.14
GR13goramaru:46: * nādaṃ tu taṃ gṛhītvā ca caitanyaṃ tatra yojayet || 10.15
GR13goramaru:47: * dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca tat || 10.16
GR13goramaru:52: * vivaraś ca tṛtīyaḥ syāc chaṅkhaśabdaś caturthakaḥ || 10.21
GR13goramaru:57: * dhvanitena vinā yas tu nādaś caivam apaṇḍitaḥ || 10.26
GR13goramaru:62: * jīvaś caivāgnidāhaḥ syān mokṣaḥ samaraso bhavet || 10.31
GR13goramaru:66: * pañcame vāci kāmitvaṃ ṣaṣṭhe bhūmiṃ parityajet || 10.35
GR13goramaru:67: * saptame dūram ālokya cāṣṭame vajravad bhavet || 10.36
GR13goramaru:69: * pṛthvīmadhye bhavet pṛthvī cāpām āpas tathaiva ca || 10.38
GR13goramaru:70: * tejomadhye bhavet tejo vāyur vāyau pralīyate || 10.39
GR13goramaru:73: * tatrārūḍho yadā yogī prāpnuyāt paramaṃ padam || 10.42]
GR13goramaru:74: ayaṃ prakṛtibhedaḥ pṛthvī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśaś ca iti śarīre pañcaguṇāḥ mahābhūtāni bhavanti tatraiva tāni pañcavidhāni bhavanti // 11
GR13goramaru:75: asthi māṃsaṃ tvak nāḍī romāṇi iti pañcaguṇā pṛthivī // 12
GR13goramaru:77: kṣudhā tṛṣṇā nidrā ālasyaṃ kāntiś ca iti pañcaguṇaṃ tejaḥ // 14
GR13goramaru:78: dhāvanaṃ valganam ākuñcanaṃ prasāraṇaṃ nirodhaś ceti pañcaguṇo vāyuḥ // 15
GR13goramaru:79: rāgo dveṣo lajjā bhayaṃ mohaś ceti pañcaguṇa ākāśaḥ iti pañcaguṇālaṅkṛtāni pañcatattvāni //
GR13goramaru:80: śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rasaḥ rūpaṃ gandhaś ceti pañca bhūtaguṇāḥ // 17
GR13goramaru:87: asthisaṃcayaṃ ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ śatatrayam asty asya prāṇena saṃbandhaḥ // 24
GR13goramaru:92: vātaḥ prāṇaprakṛtiḥ pittaṃ hutāśanodbhūtaṃ śleṣmā nirodhāt bhavati // 29
GR13goramaru:93: tvak asṛk māṃsaṃ medaḥ asthi majjā śukraṃ prāṇo jīvaḥ śaktiḥ iti daśa dhātavaḥ // 30
GR13goramaru:94: prāṇarandhradvayaṃ locanarandhradvayaṃ karṇarandhradvayaṃ mukharandhradvayam utsargarandhradvayam iti daśa dvārāṇi // 31
GR13goramaru:95_0: atha daśamadvāraṃ dvividhaṃ śukramārgam amṛtaṃ kālamārgaś ceti brahmadaṇḍamūle raviśaśimadhye
GR13goramaru:95_1: bhagākāram asti tasmād āgatabrahmadaṇḍāśritaṃ paścimaliṅgam asti paścimaśabdena sthānam
GR13goramaru:96: puruṣāṇāṃ retomārgaḥ strīṇāṃ rajomārgaḥ sahaiva tena brahmadaṇḍarekhāśritapuṣpasamaye sarvavyāpakanāḍīsamūhāgataṃ kāminīrajaḥ sravati // 33
GR13goramaru:97: tatraiva kāmaviṣaharanirañjanānāṃ saṃyogaṃ bījapātāt ānandāgamaḥ pralayakālaviṣakālayoḥ kartā nirañjanaś ca iti // 34
GR13goramaru:105: manasy āśrayatāmeti jñeyaṃ śaktitrayaṃ tu tat // 42
GR13goramaru:106: śaktitrayodbhavaṃ bījaṃ bījāt kāmo viṣaṃ tataḥ // 43
GR13goramaru:107: kāmaḥ sṛṣṭitayā prokto viṣaṃ mṛtyupadaṃ bhavet // 44
GR13goramaru:108: kiṃ bahunā kāmaviṣaharanirañjanānāṃ brahmadaṇḍamūlāṅkure nivāsaḥ ebhir yad amukho mokṣaḥ bhasmībhūtasya dehasya punar āgamanakāryaṃ nāsti // 45
GR13goramaru:109: aho mūrkhatā lokasya kecid vadanti śubhāśubhakarmavicchedanaṃ mokṣaḥ // 46
GR13goramaru:116_0: kecid vadanti susamadṛṣṭinipātalakṣaṇo mokṣaḥ ity evaṃvidhabhāvanāśritalakṣaṇo mokṣo
GR13goramaru:116_1: na bhavati atha mokṣapadaṃ kathyate yatra sahajasamādhikrameṇa manasā manaḥ samālokyate
GR13goramaru:116_2: sa eva mokṣaḥ kāmaviṣaharasthānaṃ mānasodbhavaḥ manomadhye kāraṇaṃ kāraṇāt utpattisthitipralayāḥ
GR13goramaru:119: iti jīvanmuktipadam anena mārgeṇa sthiratvaṃ bhavati // 59
GR13goramaru:120_1: ucyate tatra ādhāragranthaya ekadvitrayaś ceti ekadvitrayāṇāṃ madhye granthīnām upāntare
GR13goramaru:120_2: catuṣpatraṃ padmam adhomukhaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra karṇikāmadhye mṛṇālasūtraparimāṇā śaṅkhāvartā
GR13goramaru:127: iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumnā ca tṛtīyakā // 65
GR13goramaru:130: praṇītā sā hy anekais tu brahmāvartena saṃsthitā // 68
GR13goramaru:131: brahmadaṇḍacakreṇāsau kapālakarparaṃ yāvat tasmin kapālakarpare candramaṇḍalāntargataṃ kapālaliṅgaṃ lampikāsthānordhve 'mṛtadhārām
GR13goramaru:132: abhisravati mastakamadhye garbhe tiṣṭhati tad evāmṛtaṃ rājadantamaye śaṅkhinī brahmadaṇḍatale damayitvā sravati // 69
GR13goramaru:133: ekaṃ mukharandhraṃ rājadantāntare etad eva śaṅkhinīmukhaṃ daśamadvāram ity ucyate // 70
GR13goramaru:134_0: yatra ca mūlabhagamaṇḍalānte kuṇḍalinī śaktir vinirgatā tatra vāmabhāgodbhavasomanāḍikā
GR13goramaru:134_1: dakṣiṇabhāgodbhavasūryanāḍikā candro vāmāṅgavyāpakaḥ sūryo dakṣiṇāṅgavyāpakaḥ candro
GR13goramaru:134_2: vāmāṅge vāmanāsāpuṭaṃ sūryo dakṣiṇāṅge dakṣiṇanāsāpuṭam ity evaṃ sūryacandrau vyavasthitau //
GR13goramaru:135: yatra mūlakande pavanodayaḥ manasa udayaḥ tapanodayaḥ jīvodayaḥ śabdodayaḥ mātṛkākṣarodayaś ceti // 72
GR13goramaru:142: mūrchitā sā śivaṃ vetti prāṇair evaṃ vyavasthitā // 79
GR13goramaru:143_0: janmāvasthānād adho liṅgaḥ sa cādhārakandajātimadhyasthito guhya ūrdhve bhavati tasyordhve
GR13goramaru:143_2: samāgacchati adhaḥpradeśe maṇipūrakasya dakṣiṇapaścimavarti amedhyasthānam madhye
GR13goramaru:143_3: nābheḥ kandaḥ tatra padmākṛtiḥ tatra śarīranāḍīnām ādhāraḥ kathyate hṛdaye
GR13goramaru:144_0: pṛthivītattvaṃ pītavarṇaṃ madhye kadambagolakākṛti tatra cittaviśrāntisthānaṃ tad
GR13goramaru:144_1: eva analacakram kaṇṭhe codakapravāhapūrṇam ātmatattvaṃ tad viśuddhisthānam tālumadhye
GR13goramaru:144_2: dīpaśikhākāraḥ sadoddyotaḥ tat tejastattvam kapālakandarāṅkure vāyutattvam nāsāgre
GR13goramaru:144_3: ākāśatattvam tasyordhve ājñāsthānam ājñāsthānāntare granthiṣoḍaśāntare amṛtā ṣoḍaśī
GR13goramaru:144_4: kalā tadantare vālāgraśatadhāśrayā ante tasyordhve kalānte binduḥ bindubhedād anantaraṃ
GR13goramaru:145_0: śarīrabandhanādvayopetas trailokyavihāraḥ tasyāśritā jñānaśaktiḥ evaṃ śaktitrayālaṃkṛtaś
GR13goramaru:145_2: rūpī jalacandravat dṛśyate yaḥ sa paramātmā sarvavyāpī maheśvaraḥ caturdaśavidhabhūtagrāmakartā
